languages.text: "Обещаю приложить все усилия к воспитанию в них праведного трепета в вопросе исполнения своих обязанностей".
"I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."
languages.original_text: "Обещаю приложить все усилия к воспитанию в них праведного трепета в вопросе исполнения своих обязанностей".

traits.locale_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."
"I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."
"I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."
"I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."
"I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

languages.text: 「任務遂行に対する敬虔なる畏怖の念を彼らに刻み込むため、あらゆる努力を尽くすつもりです」
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: 「任務遂行に対する敬虔なる畏怖の念を彼らに刻み込むため、あらゆる努力を尽くすつもりです」

languages.text: "Ich verspreche, alles zu tun, um in ihnen eine heilige Ehrfurcht vor der Erfüllung ihrer Pflichten zu verankern."
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verspreche, alles zu tun, um in ihnen eine heilige Ehrfurcht vor der Erfüllung ihrer Pflichten zu verankern."

languages.text: « Je m'engage solennellement à tout faire pour leur instiller le zèle et le respect qu'exige l'accomplissement de leurs devoirs. »
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'engage solennellement à tout faire pour leur instiller le zèle et le respect qu'exige l'accomplissement de leurs devoirs. »

languages.text: «Prometo esforzarme al máximo para infundirles un respeto reverencial en lo relativo al desempeño de sus funciones».
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: «Prometo esforzarme al máximo para infundirles un respeto reverencial en lo relativo al desempeño de sus funciones».

languages.text: “我保证会尽一切努力，让那些人在履行职责时，心中充满虔诚的敬畏。”
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: “我保证会尽一切努力，让那些人在履行职责时，心中充满虔诚的敬畏。”

languages.text: "Vazifelerinde uhrevi bir güdü benimsemeleri için hepsini telkin edeceğimden emin olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "I promise to make every effort to instil in them a pious awe concerning the performance of their duties."

traits.locale_text: "Vazifelerinde uhrevi bir güdü benimsemeleri için hepsini telkin edeceğimden emin olabilirsiniz."
